param.name: imagemap.hotspot.enabled
param.desc: Enables hotspot insertion for imagemap in PDF

param.name: imagemap.hotspot.shape.color
param.desc: Hotspot shape color for imagemap. The default value is 'blue'.

param.name: imagemap.hotspot.text.color
param.desc: Hotspot text color for imagemap. The default value is 'white'.

param.name: imagemap.hotspot.legend
param.desc: Adds a legend of all hotspots found below the image. The default value is 'yes'.
